reviews.review_msg: Bob Muir is an excellent professor! I have taken numerous ARCH courses taught by him from the 100 level to the 400 level. He is one of the best professors in the SFU Archaeology department, and his lectures are really interesting to sit through. 100% recommended!
Course assignments and readings are very practical and relevant. Challenging assignments.

Bob isn't the most interesting lecturer, but then he isn't boring either. Definitely average. He didn't provide a lot of criteria for the assignments and therefore I found myself sending him a lot of emails with questions. He was pretty easy when it came to marking for participation and helped prepare you for the midterm. Overall not a bad guy
Very clear and helpful. I found his notes useful when studying for tests. Also, he doesn't pick on you if you're quiet and don't like speaking up in class.
